  font-style: bold;
  font-weight: 700;

       url('/fonts/Montserrat-Bold.woff') format('woff'),
       url('/fonts/Montserrat-Bold.ttf') format('ttf'),
       url('/fonts/awesome.eot') format('eot');
}
